headline: Stellar Cyber Named a Representative Vendor in Gartner® Hype Cycle for Midsize Enterprises, 2025
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., November 17, 2025--Stellar Cyber, the cybersecurity illumination company, today announced it has been recognized as a Representative Vendor in the Gartner Hype Cycle for Midsize Enterprises, 2025 (ID G00833100), within the Extended Detection and Response (XDR) category.

raw.headline: Stellar Cyber Named a Representative Vendor in Gartner® Hype Cycle for Midsize Enterprises, 2025

headline: Gartner: AI agents fail to ease CMO pain amid need for deeper shifts
summary: Nearly two-thirds of marketers believe AI will dramatically change their role, but many are not making the organizational changes needed to deliver results.

raw.headline: Gartner: AI agents fail to ease CMO pain amid need for deeper shifts
